title: No compensation for false bans?
body:
I was falsely banned a few days ago, and my ban was lifted. However I lost a lot more than access to my account that day; my university team kicked me as they didn't want to take any risks, my reddit account blasted, but most of all my credibility as a player or a coach was destroyed.

I emailed support if they could provide a statement for me to, like, show people IRL that my account was false flagged. They're not allowed to speak on the system's behalf.

Ok.

How about me not walking away empty-handed? Some gift card or RP would be almost equivalent to the empty apology of making a bread basket; atleast I would have something from the ordeal:

'Unfortunately, we are not providing compensation for this incident'

... Nice.

replies.body: It's one of those things they just don't do, but as far as your credibility is concerned, would it not be enough to show them your correspondence with support? I thought you ticketed them and they said your account was unbanned/shouldn't have been banned in the first place?
Because the response was automated and not actually a reply to the ticket it doesn't have the same merrit

Hmm true enough, well, if my word means anything as a volunteer I'm happy to explain the sitch to anyone relevant if they want to add me in game, but I'm not really know outside of boards and obviously not official Riot. I'm afraid that's the best I can offer really.
Cause Rito don't care, like all big companies :( RIP
